duties_responsibilities.duty: Register, label, retrieve, and discard biological and production materials in accordance with Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs).
Adhere to FDA Good Practices, International Organization of Standards (ISO), and other regulatory requirements as outlined in SOPs.
Handle materials in a manner that maintains required temperatures per the project definition and SOPs.
Utilize the Company Inventory Management System for sample handling tasks and ensure chain of custody and audit trails for all activities.
Perform quality control checks and investigate/document issues encountered in registration or retrieval of materials.
Assist with freezer maintenance and upkeep of the facility.

education_certification.credential: Associate Degree OR HS Diploma + 2 years of relevant experience OR six months’ demonstrated proficiency as a Biobank Assistant. Life Sciences experience preferred
